description:
A New Training All About the Complimentary Call:

The Complimentary Coaching call is vital. It's where people move from being “interested” in you as a coach to paying you what you're worth as a coach! The Complimentary Call is so important that I wanted to offer some specific training focused on it… so you could start applying these strategies to gain “great fit” clients who pay you well… right away!

This NEW training will give you a step-by-step process for how to handle every minute of the complimentary call!

You Will Learn:

  • How to spend each and every minute of the complimentary call!
  • How to use the specific questions I ask in my complimentary calls!
  • How to position specific questions so the potential client will sell themselves on working with you!
  • How to close complimentary calls via step by step instructions without feeling sales-ey!

Listen to REAL WORLD calls!

Have you ever heard about some coaches “closing theory” and wondered if it would actually work? . . . or if it was actually scripted? Would it be helpful to hear actual, real world strategies as they play out, LIVE on the phone?

  • Listen in to 5 separate complimentary calls with Mitch Matthews
  • Be a fly on the wall as he uses “Confidence to Close” strategies
  • Experience the closing of over $16,000 in coaching services
  • Hear how you can do it to! These strategies are for anyone!

Confidence to Close Training Will Give You:

  • The Confidence to Collect Payment UP FRONT!
  • The Confidence to set prices & get paid what you are WORTH!
  • The Confidence to only take those clients who are a GOOD FIT for you!
  • The Confidence to actually ENJOY complimentary calls!
  • The Confidence to CLOSE as many clients as you want!
title: Sales Training for Life Coaches: Confidence to Close
